text: Paul D. McGowan (1947 â€“ July 28, 2014) was an American politician from Maine. A Democrat, McGowan was elected to the Maine House of Representatives in 2012. McGowan died unexpectedly on July 28, 2014 from an unknown illness. He was not seeking re-election. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:United States representatives from Maine Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Paul D. McGowan
